title: Strictly champ Stacey Dooley gives glimpse into boyfriend Kevin Clifton's birthday party

Strictly Come Dancing reigning champion Stacey Dooley gave her 775,000 followers a glimpse into her boyfriend's birthday party with a cute, loved-up picture.

The documentary film maker and her dancer boyfriend Kevin Clifton met on Strictly last year, when they took to the floor together.

After the show was done and they were crowned winners, the pair struck up a romance and have been going strong ever since.

Stacey, 32, took to her Instragram story with a pic of the two of them beaming for the camera.

Behind them is a bunch of balloons that spell out: "KING KEVIN."

Stacey captioned it: "Happy birthday King K."

(Image: sjdooley/Instagram)

(Image: sjdooley/Instagram)

Taking to the dance floor once, she also gave fans another look at her moves.

Earlier, she shared a similar of the two of them stealing away for a private cuddle, the King Kevin balloons looming overhead.

Stacey just wrote "37" alongside a heart emoji.

Fellow Strictly star Amy Dowden couldn't get enough of the couple, gushing "love this" with a string of hearts.

Kevin's run on Strictly with the class of 2019 hasn't been quite so long lived.

(Image: sjdooley/Instagram)

(Image: sjdooley/Instagram)

His time with broadcaster partner Anneka Rice came to an end in Week Two of the show, which is the earliest he's ever left.

Despite their early crash out, Kevin and Anneka clearly bonded, as Kevin posted a heartwarming tribute to the 61 year-old.

He wrote: "Thank u @annekariceart. We had a lovely few weeks.

"The improvement you made in such a short space of time was fantastic and I loved seeing u dance with your heart in that beautiful waltz.

"Good luck to all the other contestants in what is already shaping up to be an unforgettable @bbcstrictly series."

Anneka echoed the sentiment, writing: "Well, that was like running away to the circus. What an adventure.

"It was such fun I kept forgetting it was a dance competition and I would have to leave.

"Thank you @keviclifton for small miracles."
description: The Strictly pro was celebrating his 37th birthday and girlfriend Stacey gave fans a look into the party with a loved-up snap and some epic dancing videos
